title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.2 - Declaration by mail
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.2 - Declaration by mail

State Regulations

Declarations for any race may be accepted if made by mail
or telegraph and deposited in the declaration box prior to the time prescribed
for closing declarations. Such declaration must set forth the information
required in section
4111.1
of this Part. Every owner
bears the risk of ineligibility caused by noncompliance with the declaration
requirements by any agency selected to make or forward
declarations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4111.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
